You can control Heritrix via command line using the JMX client:
http://craw=
ler.archive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user=
_manual/outside.html#jmxclient

which is a jar in the bin directory of Heri=
trix.

You run it with
java -jar cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar controlRole:<=
password> localhost:8849

and from there you get the bean of Heritrix and t=
he existing jobs, and you can do a few operations which include controlling=
 the active jobs and Heritrix itself.
